bad_file_extension: The file extension is not valid. Please select a .csv file.
double_resource_for_one_resource_type: Lines #%lineNb1% and #%lineNb2% contain the same resource type for the same resource. Please use different resource names.
invalid_color_format: The value in the "color" must be in the .hex format. Line #%lineNb%.
invalid_column_headers: Column %columnName% hasn't been found in the file.
invalid_number_characters_localisation: The string in the "localization" column must have maximum 255 characters. Line #%lineNb%.
invalid_number_characters_name: The string in the "name" column must have minimum 2 and maximum 50 characters. Line #%lineNb%.
invalid_number_characters_resource_type: The string in the "resource_type" column must have minimum 2 and maximum 50 characters. Line #%lineNb%.
invalid_number_of_column: Line  #%lineNb% needs to be written on 7 colums.
invalid_number_quantity: The value in the "quantity" column must be minimum 1. Line #%lineNb%.
invalid_type_for_max_time_reservation: Use format hh:mm ou hh:mm:ss in the "max_time_reservation" column. Line #%lineNb%.
number_reservations_exceeded: You have exceeded the number of reservations for this resource. Please change the date or the resource.
resource_already_exists_for_resource_typ: The name of the resource alreaddy exists for this resource type. Line #%lineNb%.
valid_date_range_required: The start date may not precede or be equal to the start date.
valid_duration_format_required: Invalid format the the duration. Use the form la forme hh:mm.
valid_max_duration_required: You have exceeded the maximum reservation time for this resource.
